setting.name: authname
setting.description: Name used by the phone for authentication.

setting.name: displayname
setting.description: Identification as it should appear for caller ID purposes.

setting.name: name
setting.description: Number or name for use when registering.

setting.name: password
setting.description: Password used by the phone for authentication.

setting.name: shortname
setting.description: Name used for key label on the phone display.

setting.name: address
setting.description: IP address or FQDN of the SIP proxy server used by this line.

setting.name: port
setting.description: Port number of the SIP proxy server used by this line.
